articles.title: Yellen Chides China Over ‘Coercive’ Moves Against US Firms - Bloomberg
articles.description: Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen chided China for “unfair” treatment of American and other foreign companies and said its factories risk producing more than the world can easily absorb, as she began a four-day visit to the country.

articles.author: Hillary Andrews
articles.title: NASA wants you to help gather Sun data during total solar eclipse - Fox Weather
articles.description: If you have always wanted to be a NASA scientist, here is your chance. NASA is involved in several scientific research projects that need your help if you are along the path of totality during the America's Total Eclipse on April 8th.
